txt.en: Barzglúk and bats can be found in Máttugard.\n\nYou should defeat bats.
You have defeated Barzglúk and assisted those who wish to reclaim Gundabad.

The bounty notice reads:

'Who among you has not known the fear of a bat's shriek in the darkness? It is a warning to quickly seek the safety of light and fire. But this is Gundabad, where the bats have owned these halls for a very long time! Must we always have to watch our backs?!

'Of all the bats that lurk in these halls, none is more dangerous than the one named Barzglúk. A reward to any who can bring down this great bat, along with others of his cauldron!'
A bounty notice asks you to seek out Barzglúk, a terrifying great bat found in Máttugard.
